description: I am a passionate developer specializing in modern and responsive web applications.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Who I am and what I enjoy doing.
profile.aboutText: I am currently a BUT Computer Science student at IUT de Vannes and a developer apprentice at SCR Informatiques. I am passionate about development and like building clear interfaces and polished user experiences.
profile.goalsText: Graduate, keep building technical and professional skills. I would like to pursue engineering school or a master's degree to strengthen my expertise and specialize in a specific field.

contact.cta: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.
